mission.lead: Every day, our clients transform lives through meaningful work in education, community development, healthcare, youth and family services, recreation -- the list goes on and on.
body: Each one of them has a unique mission, but they all have two things in common: they make a difference in their community, and they can prove it. How? Through an intentional, measurable approach to advancing their mission.

Mission advancement requires the use of best practices, hard work, persistence, and a healthy sense of humor. The decisions your organization makes today will dictate the capacity of your community impact tomorrow.
ctaQuestions: What strategies will drive your mission forward?
Are you making a difference in your community?

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.intro: Advancement is achieved through purposeful planning and hard work.
principles: Your mission is relevant and meaningful
Your work is valued by others
Your organization and its leaders are trustworthy
Your organization and its leaders keep their promises to the community

pillars.title: Active Listening
pillars.description: Every client, every situation and every community is unique. Our first objective is to understand the specific needs of your organization within the context of your community.

pillars.title: Custom Solutions
pillars.description: We create solutions that precisely fit your organization by applying proven best practices to your specific needs.

services.name: Strategic Planning
services.description: The community you serve expects progress. Our straightforward strategic planning process delivers a functional road map for your future.
deliverables: Current strategic plan review and evaluation
“Gaps” analysis
Strategic plan facilitation
A relevant, logical plan you will actually use -- with measurable strategies

services.name: Resource Development
services.description: As a nonprofit organization, stewardship is your highest calling. Resources are scarce and highly competitive. Our proven methods for resource development deliver effective results.
deliverables: A reliable system for annual and capital giving
A larger, more committed donor base
Diversified funding streams
A broader network of strategic alliances
An intentional process for board development
An engaged board that understands the job
Results-driven committees and task forces
More volunteers delivering your mission
Facility/program development

services.name: Community Relations
services.description: A strong plan for sustainability and growth begins with credibility. Our process delivers improved community relations between your organization and your stakeholders.
deliverables: Successful methods for sharing your story
Broader understanding and support for your cause
An image boost
Stronger relationships with your stakeholders

services.name: Community Impact
services.description: Our ultimate goal is to advance your mission. We will collaborate with you to:
deliverables: Leverage and build on existing strengths
Identify and seize opportunities
Develop a plan that is relevant and measurable
Steward existing resources more effectively
Cultivate strategic alliances and other resources
Solve or minimize existing setbacks
Avoid future obstacles

about.name: Jeanne Marie Ellis
about.lead: A boutique firm in Austin specializing in advancement strategies for nonprofit organizations. Customized solutions for strategic planning, resource development, and community relations.
bio: Jeanne Marie holds a bachelor's degree in Public Relations from Texas Tech University. Her career spans over three decades and includes strategic planning, nonprofit operations, public relations, marketing, financial development, volunteer development and facility development.
She co-authored a national study for the YMCA called Doing More Together, which explores the rising trends among municipalities partnering with YMCAs to address specific community needs.
Jeanne Marie and her husband, Tom, have two grown children. They attend Austin Christian Fellowship, where she serves on the Missions Leadership Team.

contact.intro: We'd love to hear from you. Reach out to start a conversation about advancing your mission.
